title: Rare vintage cars for sale in SA, New VW Golf 8 revealed - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Volkswagen officially lifted the covers off of its new 8th generation Golf which will be making its way to South Africa next year.



More and more people are choosing automatic transmissions over manual ones but how much will it cost to replace if it breaks for some reason. We take a look at five new luxury sedans.

Top stories

We take a look at a few of the most-searched budget city cars currently priced below R140 000. This is a cool guide if you are in the market for an affordable set of wheels.

READ | New Volkswagen Golf 8 breaks cover and this is when it's coming to SA

Judging by its appearance, Hyundai's new Veloster Grappler is an all-terrain mean machine set to be revealed in November at the 2019 SEMA show in Las Vegas.

A private collection of 70 rare classic cars, and more than 10 000 spare parts found in an estate in Stellenbosch will go under the hammer next month.

description: The 8th generation VW Golf has been unveiled and see how much it will cost to replace an automatic gearbox on a luxury sedan. Here are your top stories of the day.
